```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)

df <- read.csv(file = "https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/data/local-climatological-data/access/2019/72214093805.csv") %>%
  dplyr::filter(REPORT_TYPE == "FM-15") %>%
  mutate(Date = ymd_hms(DATE),
         HourlyDryBulbTemperature = as.numeric(HourlyDryBulbTemperature),
         HourlyPrecipitation = as.numeric(HourlyPrecipitation),
         HourlyWindDirection = as.numeric(HourlyWindDirection)) %>%
  dplyr::select(Date, starts_with("Hourly")) 

df2 <- df %>%
  dplyr::filter(HourlyDryBulbTemperature >= 100)

df <- read.csv(file = "https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/data/local-climatological-data/access/2019/72214093805.csv") %>%
  dplyr::filter(REPORT_TYPE == "SOD  ") %>%
  mutate(Date = ymd_hms(DATE),
         DailyMaximumDryBulbTemperature = as.numeric(DailyMaximumDryBulbTemperature)) %>%
  dplyr::select(Date, starts_with("DailyMaximum"))

df %>%
  dplyr::filter(DailyMaximumDryBulbTemperature >= 100)
```
